text: Jun qꞌijal kꞌut jujun achyabꞌ aꞌj Israel6:9 Are kutzijoj rij jun achi ri tzoqopitalik, tajin kutzijoj kij ri e kijaꞌl ri aꞌj Israel ri e kꞌamtal bꞌik che ajchakibꞌ pa ri tinimit Roma. Are waꞌ ri kekꞌayix bꞌik kꞌa te riꞌ ketzoqopix bꞌik. ri kepe pa ri tinimit Cirene, pa Alejandría, xuqujeꞌ pa Cilicia rech Asia ri kebꞌe pa ri Sinagoga ubꞌiꞌnam patanijelabꞌ ri e tzoqopitalik. Xkichapleꞌj ukꞌululaꞌxik uwach ri utzij ri Esteban.
